meanings.sent1: The sheep had the woolliest coat in the flock.
meanings.sent2: Her sweater was the woolliest one I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The woolliest blanket kept me warm on the coldest night.
meanings.sent4: The clouds looked like the woolliest sheep floating in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The woolliest teddy bear was so soft and cuddly.

meanings.sent1: The woolliest sheep in the field stood out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the woolliest clouds slowly dissipated.
meanings.sent3: The woolliest hat made him look like a walking sheep.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was the woolliest of them all, full of fluff.
meanings.sent5: The woolliest sweater kept her cozy during the winter.

meanings.sent1: The woolliest fabric felt soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The woolliest plant in the garden had fuzzy leaves.
meanings.sent3: The woolliest clouds looked like cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the woolliest, soothing and warm.
meanings.sent5: The woolliest carpet made the room feel cozy and inviting.
